name: Soviet Union
declaringWar: Well, Comrade it looks like We are going to fight. I hope you are not mad at me.
attacked: You! How cloud you do that to Us.
defeated: Good fight my friend, I hope to see you soon.
introduction: Greeting, Comrade! What would you say to me showing you around the streets of my cities?
neutralHello: Good to see you well my frieand. what can i do for you?
hateYes: Yea, I can agree to that
afterPeace: Good We don't have to fight anymore, what do you say about a glass of vodka?
tradeRequest: I hope you agree my frieand
